text: The plovercrest (Stephanoxis lalandi) is a species of hummingbird. It is found in Argentina, Brazil, and Paraguay. Its habitats are subtropical or tropical moist montane forest,Montane = highlands below subalpine zone. and degraded former forest. The Plovercrest has a blue chest, green back and white flanks. ==References== * BirdLife International 2004. Stephanoxis lalandi. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 10 July 2007. Category:Birds of South America Category:Hummingbirds
title: Plovercrest
